deab04cc.name: GetString
deab04cc.description: When overridden in a derived class, decodes a sequence of bytes into a string.

e71320a1.name: GetDecoder
e71320a1.description: Obtains a decoder that converts a UTF-8 encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

28839421.name: GetEncoder
28839421.description: Obtains an encoder that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into a UTF-8 encoded sequence of bytes.

cb3119dc.name: GetMaxByteCount
cb3119dc.description: Calculates the maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.

5548376a.name: GetMaxCharCount
5548376a.description: Calculates the maximum number of characters produced by decoding the specified number of bytes.

77a91a8e.name: GetPreamble
77a91a8e.description: Returns a Unicode byte order mark encoded in UTF-8 format, if the  encoding object is configured to supply one.

7fc477c9.name: Equals
7fc477c9.description: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current  object.

5144bc2d.name: GetHashCode
5144bc2d.description: Returns the hash code for the current instance.

8426ff97.name: Clone
8426ff97.description: When overridden in a derived class, creates a shallow copy of the current  object.

af4dc6e7.name: IsAlwaysNormalized
af4dc6e7.description: Gets a value indicating whether the current encoding is always normalized.

719c5ec9.name: IsAlwaysNormalized
719c5ec9.description: Gets a value indicating whether the current encoding is always normalized.

ad511a42.name: GetType
ad511a42.description: Gets the  of the current instance.

f231422a.name: ToString
f231422a.description: Returns a string that represents the current object.
